text: I would like to get more advice on my career path (aircraft engineering) and what it would take me there. Could you please tell me what University did you do to get where you are now? Would you advise the same to me?

I went to Napier in Edinburgh. I chose the degree because it included industrial training as a compulsory part of the course. I spent two Summers’ working for an electronic design company. It was good as it helped me decide that electronic design engineering wasn’t for me. I took an interest in their manufacturing and hence I decided to go into manufacturing engineering but within the electronics industry. I would certainly recommend doing an engineering course that enables you to get into industry to see what it is all about.
